titleInfo.title: Donor Wall at Beth Israel Hospital

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#138 Beth Israel Hospital''. On back of photograph: ''#138 Beth Israel Hospital Donor Mrs. Leah Eisen''. On front of photograph ''Adolph Kiesler''.

mods.abstract: Donor wall at Beth Israel Hospital in Denver, Colorado. A portrait of Dr. Adolph Kiesler is hung in the center of the wall and there are columns of the names of donors flanking the portrait on either side.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
